ginalDefenseLevel","type":"uint256"}],"name":"setOriginalDefenseLevel","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"name":"_gameId","type":"uint256"},{"name":"_lastBetAmount","type":"uint256"},{"name":"_supportedPlayer","type":"address"},{"name":"_opponentPlayer","type":"address"},{"name":"_randomNum","type":"uint256"}],"name":"bet","outputs":[{"name":"attackType","type":"string"},{"name":"attackHash","type":"bytes32"},{"name":"defenseLevelSupportedPlayer","type":"uint256"},{"name":"defenseLevelOpponent","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"name":"_gameId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"GameStarted","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"name":"_gameId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"FightMapGenerated","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"name":"_gameId","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":true,"name":"_supportedPlyer","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"name":"_lastBetAmount","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"attackHash","type":"bytes32"},{"indexed":false,"name":"attackType","type":"string"},{"indexed":false,"name":"defenseLevelSupportedPlayer","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"name":"defenseLevelOpponent","type":"uint256"}],"name":"BetPlaced","type":"event"}],"devdoc":{"author":"@ziweidream","methods":{"bet(uint256,uint256,address,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"this function can only be called by the GameManager contract","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_lastBetAmount":"the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game","_opponentPlayer":"the address of the opponent player in the game","_randomNum":"the random number generated when the supported player presses Button Bet in the game","_supportedPlayer":"the address of the supported player in the game"},"return":"the attack type and attackHash for the supported player, and current defense level of the supported and the opponent player"},"fillBets(uint256,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_betAmount":"the ether amount of the bet placed by the given corner","_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game for whom the individual bet ether amount is recorded"}},"getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_lastBetAmount":"the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game","_randomNum":"the random number generated by the front end when Button bet is pressed by the given corner","_supportedPlayer":"the given corner in this game for whom the attack type is randomly selected"},"return":"the attackType randomly selected for the given corner, the attackHash for the attackType selected, and the index of the attackHash returned in the fight map"},"getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the blocked attacks are obtained"},"return":"an array of fixed size 7 blockedAttacks, which contains the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game"},"getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the direct attacks are obtained"},"return":"an array of fixed size 7 directAttacks, which contains the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game"},"getLastFourBets(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"lastBet1 is the last bet, lastBet2 is the second last bet, and so forth","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game whose individual bet ether amount is recorded"},"return":"the last 5 bet ether amount by the given corner in a game"},"getNumberOfBets(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game whose individual bet ether amount is recorded"},"return":"the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game"},"isAttackBlocked(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_opponentPlayer":"the address of the opponent player in this game"},"return":"true if the attack type is blocked, false if it is direct"},"randomGen(uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","return":"The random number generated"},"reduceDefenseLevel(uint256,uint256,address,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_opponentPlayer":"the address of the opponent player in this game whose defense level is reduced if contidions stated above are met","_supportedPlayer":"the address of the supported player in this game whose last 5 bets ether amount are compared"},"return":"the defense level of the opponent player in the game"},"setBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the blocked attacks are recorded","index":"the index in the mapping blockedAttacksScored. The index is obtained in function getAttackType()"}},"setDefenseLevel(uint256,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game for whom the defense level is recorded"}},"setDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the direct attacks are recorded","index":"the index in the mapping directAttacksScored. The index is obtained in function getAttackType()"}},"setFightMap(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game for which the fight map is generated","_randomBlack":"black number generated when the black corner presses Button start","_randomRed":"random number generated when the red corner presses Button start"}},"setLastBetTimestamp(uint256,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_lastBetTimestamp":"the timestamp of the last bet placed by the given corner in the game","_player":"the given corner in this game whose last bet timestamp is recorded"}},"setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"this function is only called by GameManager contract","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_originalDefenseLevel":"the original defense level of the given corner, which is calculated in the function startGame() in GameManager","_player":"the address of the given corner in this game for whom the defense level is recorded"}},"startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"this function can only be called by the GameManager contract","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_randomBlack":"the random number generated when the Black corner presses the Button Bet","_randomRed":"the random number generated when the Red corner presses the Button Bet"}}},"title":"This contract is responsible to carry out the betting module in a game"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"bet(uint256,uint256,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"determines the attack type, attackHash, and current opponent defense level partially depending on the effect of each bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"fillBets(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"record the bet ether amount of each individual bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"randomly select attack types from low values column or high values column depending on the bet ether amount by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game"},"getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game"},"getLastFourBets(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the ether amount of the last 5 bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getNumberOfBets(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"isAttackBlocked(uint256,address)":{"notice":"determine whether the attack type by the supported player is blocked or direct in a game with a specific gameId"},"randomGen(uint256)":{"notice":"generates a random number from 0 to 100 based on the last block hash, blocktime, block difficulty, and seed"},"reduceDefenseLevel(uint256,uint256,address,address)":{"notice":"reduce the defense level of the opponent if each of the last 5 bets ether amount from the attacker was consecutively bigger than the previous one in a game with a specific gameId"},"setBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"record the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game"},"setDefenseLevel(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"record the current defense level of the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"setDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"record the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game"},"setFightMap(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"set fight map for a game with a specific gameId"},"setLastBetTimestamp(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"record the last bet timestamp for the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"record the original defense level of the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"setProxy(address)":{"notice":"Set/update address of Proxy contract"},"startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"generates a fight map for a game with a specific gameId, and calculates the original defense levels of both corners in this nodes.name: getAttackType
isAttackBlocked
reduceDefenseLevel
randomGen
startGame
bet

devdoc.author: @ziweidream

bet(uint256,uint256,address,address,uint.author: @ziweidream
bet(uint256,uint256,address,address,uint.details: this function can only be called by the GameManager contract

params._lastBetAmount: the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game
params._opponentPlayer: the address of the opponent player in the game
params._randomNum: the random number generated when the supported player presses Button Bet in the game
params._supportedPlayer: the address of the supported player in the game

bet(uint256,uint256,address,address,uint.return: the attack type and attackHash for the supported player, and current defense level of the supported and the opponent player

params._betAmount: the ether amount of the bet placed by the given corner
params._player: the given corner in this game for whom the individual bet ether amount is recorded

getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,ui.author: @ziweidream

params._lastBetAmount: the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game
params._randomNum: the random number generated by the front end when Button bet is pressed by the given corner
params._supportedPlayer: the given corner in this game for whom the attack type is randomly selected

getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,ui.return: the attackType randomly selected for the given corner, the attackHash for the attackType selected, and the index of the attackHash returned in the fight map

getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._player: the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the blocked attacks are obtained

getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address).return: an array of fixed size 7 blockedAttacks, which contains the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game

getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._player: the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the direct attacks are obtained

getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address).return: an array of fixed size 7 directAttacks, which contains the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game

getLastFourBets(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream
getLastFourBets(uint256,address).details: lastBet1 is the last bet, lastBet2 is the second last bet, and so forth

params._player: the given corner in this game whose individual bet ether amount is recorded

getLastFourBets(uint256,address).return: the last 5 bet ether amount by the given corner in a game

getNumberOfBets(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._player: the given corner in this game whose individual bet ether amount is recorded

getNumberOfBets(uint256,address).return: the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game

isAttackBlocked(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._opponentPlayer: the address of the opponent player in this game

isAttackBlocked(uint256,address).return: true if the attack type is blocked, false if it is direct

reduceDefenseLevel(uint256,uint256,addre.author: @ziweidream

params._opponentPlayer: the address of the opponent player in this game whose defense level is reduced if contidions stated above are met
params._supportedPlayer: the address of the supported player in this game whose last 5 bets ether amount are compared

reduceDefenseLevel(uint256,uint256,addre.return: the defense level of the opponent player in the game

params._player: the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the blocked attacks are recorded
params.index: the index in the mapping blockedAttacksScored. The index is obtained in function getAttackType()

params._player: the given corner in this game for whom the defense level is recorded
the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the direct attacks are recorded
params.index: the index in the mapping directAttacksScored. The index is obtained in function getAttackType()

params._gameId: the gameID of the game for which the fight map is generated
params._randomBlack: black number generated when the black corner presses Button start
params._randomRed: random number generated when the red corner presses Button start

params._lastBetTimestamp: the timestamp of the last bet placed by the given corner in the game
params._player: the given corner in this game whose last bet timestamp is recorded

setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,.author: @ziweidream
setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,.details: this function is only called by GameManager contract

params._originalDefenseLevel: the original defense level of the given corner, which is calculated in the function startGame() in GameManager
params._player: the address of the given corner in this game for whom the defense level is recorded

startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256).author: @ziweidream
startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: this function can only be called by the GameManager contract

params._randomBlack: the random number generated when the Black corner presses the Button Bet
params._randomRed: the random number generated when the Red corner presses the Button Bet

devdoc.title: This contract is responsible to carry out the betting module in a game

bet(uint256,uint256,address,address,uint.notice: determines the attack type, attackHash, and current opponent defense level partially depending on the effect of each bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

fillBets(uint256,address,uint256).notice: record the bet ether amount of each individual bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,ui.notice: randomly select attack types from low values column or high values column depending on the bet ether amount by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address).notice: get the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game

getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address).notice: get the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game

getLastFourBets(uint256,address).notice: get the ether amount of the last 5 bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getNumberOfBets(uint256,address).notice: get the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

isAttackBlocked(uint256,address).notice: determine whether the attack type by the supported player is blocked or direct in a game with a specific gameId

randomGen(uint256).notice: generates a random number from 0 to 100 based on the last block hash, blocktime, block difficulty, and seed

reduceDefenseLevel(uint256,uint256,addre.notice: reduce the defense level of the opponent if each of the last 5 bets ether amount from the attacker was consecutively bigger than the previous one in a game with a specific gameId

setBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address,.notice: record the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game

setDefenseLevel(uint256,address,uint256).notice: record the current defense level of the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

setDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address,u.notice: record the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game

setFightMap(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: set fight map for a game with a specific gameId

setLastBetTimestamp(uint256,address,uint.notice: record the last bet timestamp for the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,.notice: record the original defense level of the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: generates a fight map for a game with a specific gameId, and calculates the original defense levels of both corners in this game
